articles.title: Mass Rallies Support DPRK Government's Statement
articles.content:
Mass Rallies Support DPRK Government's Statement
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- North Hwanghae, Kangwon and Ryanggan Provincial and Nampho City mass rallies took place Sunday to support the statement of the DPRK government.
					 Present there were officials of local party, power and economic organs, working people's organizations, factories, enterprises, farms and universities and working people, youths and students.
					
					 The statement of the DPRK government was read out at the rallies, which was followed by speeches of vice-chairmen of the provincial party committees and the vice-chairman of the city party committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and representatives of workers, agricultural workers, intellectuals and youths.
					
					 The speakers fully supported the statement of the DPRK government which flatly rejected the "sanctions resolution" illegally fabricated by the U.S. and other hostile forces.
					
					 The hideous and brigandish act of the U.S. and other hostile forces that fabricated the "sanctions resolution" by abusing the UN while faulting the DPRK's ICBM test-fire is an intolerable hideous state-sponsored terrorism, they noted.
					
					 The situation in which the U.S. imperialists styling themselves the "world's only superpower" are working out only dirty criminal documents even by mobilizing riff-raffs clearly proves that the Workers' Party of Korea's independent line, the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts is quite right, the speakers said.
					
					 They stressed that as long as they are led by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, and there is single-minded unity more powerful than a nuclear weapon, the final victory will always belong to the DPRK no matter how many formidable enemies may come in attack.
					
					 Then followed mass demonstrations.

articles.title: Participants in International Festival in Praise of Great Persons of Mt Paektu Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Participants in International Festival in Praise of Great Persons of Mt Paektu Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Sunday.
					 The visitors paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace.
					
					 At the halls where the great leaders lie in state, the participants paid homage to them.
					
					 They looked round halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house cars, electronic car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Participants in International Festival in Praise of Great Persons of Mt Paektu Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in International Festival in Praise of Great Persons of Mt Paektu Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Fifth International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu visited Mangyongdae, the birth place of President Kim Il Sung, on Sunday.
					 They laid a floral basket before his old home in Mangyongdae and looked round historic relics preserved with much care.

articles.title: National Folk Music Contests of Popular Art Field Held
articles.content:
National Folk Music Contests of Popular Art Field Held
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- A national folk music contest of popular art field was held in Pyongyang.
					 The contest brought together more than 300 members of art squads of Pyongyang City, Kangwon Province, South Hamgyong Province and South Hwanghae Province, members of the city and county mobile art squads and members of art circles active in factories, enterprises and co-op farms, who won at city, county, provincial and district contests that began from August 7.
					
					 There were performances given by organizations which took part in the contests at the People's Palace of Culture and the Central Hall of Workers on August 10 and 11.
					
					 Put on the stage were songs praising the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and their noble traits of loving the people and folk songs and folk dances of various genres which help enshrine the Korean nation-first spirit.
					
					 Among the audience were working people in the city.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Support Statement of DPRK Government
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Support Statement of DPRK Government
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements on August 9 actively supporting the statement of the DPRK government which denounced the UN Security Council's "sanctions resolution".
					 Ko Tok U, chairman of the Nishi Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, in a statement fully supported in the name of the officials and compatriots of the headquarters the statement of the DPRK government.
					
					 The statement said that all officials and compatriots under the headquarters will keep pace with the people in the homeland straightly advancing toward the road of independence, Songun and socialism, with conviction to win the final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. under the leadership of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Pu Yong Uk, chairman of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said that the ICBM test-fire carried out by the DPRK was a legitimate measure for self-defence and an inevitable strategic option for defending the sovereignty of the country and the right to existence of the nation and the peace of the Korean peninsula and the security of the region from the hostile policy and nuclear threat and blackmail of the hostile forces led by the U.S.
					
					 Ri Pak Ji, chairman of the Toshun branch of Aichi Prefecture of Chongryon, said that the brigandish double-standards by which only big countries like the U.S. are allowed to conduct scores and hundreds of nuclear and ICBM tests and other countries are not allowed to do are never tolerable.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Delegation of Union of Korean Teachers in Japan
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Delegation of Union of Korean Teachers in Japan
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the visiting delegation of the Union of Korean Teachers in Japan on August 9.
					 In the letter the members of the delegation said their days in the homeland were the unforgettable days during which they cherished the biggest and most precious thing in their life.
					
					 We were so excited to greet the great national event of the successful second test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14 personally guided by Marshal Kim Jong Un, and renewed their belief that the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche is at hand, thanks to the great brilliant Songun commander, it noted.
					
					 Seeing the confidant people at homeland who rose up as a mountain in response to the statement of the DPRK government categorically rejecting the illicit UN "sanctions resolution", we got to know that no force on the earth can block the army and people of the DPRK from advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, rallied close around the respected Marshal, the letter said.
					
					 The letter stressed that Kim Jong Un is a peerless patriot and great sun ensuring the eternal prosperity of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea as he is bringing about the final victory in the showdown with the U.S. and the building of socialist power with his Songun leadership, adding:
					
					 It is the immutable faith we deeply cherished during our stay in the homeland that the victory in the revolutionary cause of Juche and the patriotic cause of Chongryon is a science thanks to you.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules S. Korean Puppet Forces' Act of Escalating Confrontation with Compatriots in North
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules S. Korean Puppet Forces' Act of Escalating Confrontation with Compatriots in North
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces have gone more reckless in escalating confrontation with compatriots in the north than ever before, while taking the advantage of the U.S. moves to invade Korea. This is no more than futile hysteria of colonial mercenary army taken aback by the inexhaustible military might of the DPRK. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article says in this regard: 
					
					 It is the criminal scenario of the puppet forces to intensify sanctions and pressure against the DPRK with the backing of outside forces and realize the foolish daydream of "the north's abandonment of nuclear program".
					
					 As soon as the puppet authorities took power, they begged their master U.S. for "cooperation in denuclearization" of the north and let out a flurry of such rhetoric as "simultaneous application of sanctions and dialogue", going desperate to block the DPRK from bolstering up the nuclear deterrent for self-defense.
					
					 Their "policy toward the north" was hit from all directions soon after its emergence, and this touched off stronger curse and denunciation against the authorities inside and outside. They have, therefore, resorted to reckless saber-rattling by fanning up the military gangsters in a bid to find a way out in military provocation.
					
					 But, it is ridiculous for the puppet warmongers to make desperate efforts to hurt someone through their futile saber-rattling.
					
					 If the puppet forces follow the U.S. which is falling deeper into the abyss of final doom despite the DPRK's warning, they would meet a barrage of fire.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Force Deters U.S. Nuclear War: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Force Deters U.S. Nuclear War: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The strategic nuclear force of the DPRK is the best safeguard deterring the U.S. imperialists' nuclear war on the Korean peninsula, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 More than seven decades have passed since the first nuclear weapon appeared in the earth.
					
					 The main character of the period is that possession of the strategic nuclear force decided positions of big powers.
					
					 The Cold War has continued worldwide and many big or small wars broke out in different regions. But the nuclear possessors did not suffer military aggression.
					
					 As the days go by, some nuclear possessors decide major international issues in line with their own interests and their arbitrary practices baffle human imagination.
					
					 In particular, the Korean peninsula has historically been the biggest hotbed in the world where strategic interests of big powers sharply collide with each other for its importance of the geopolitical position.
					
					 The U.S. has openly imposed military threats and blackmail upon the DPRK by wielding a nuclear stick for its strategic interests.
					
					 The DPRK has drawn the precious lesson that the danger of nuclear war can never disappear as long as the U.S., the worst nuclear warmonger in the world, threatens the DPRK with nukes, and the only mean to remove the danger of nuclear war is the nuclear weapon of justice.
					
					 According to the resolute strategic decision of the Workers' Party of Korea to cope with the nuclear with nuclear, the DPRK has equipped with the reliable nuclear deterrence for self-defence and became the world's nuclear power despite harsh hardships and ordeals.
					
					 The nuclear imbalance between the DPRK and the U.S. has totally ended.
					
					 Nothing can deny the historic feats of the DPRK which has contributed to ensuring peace and security in the Korean peninsula and the rest of the world as a responsible nuclear possessor.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Quarters' Submission to U.S. Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Quarters' Submission to U.S. Flailed
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Taken aback by the DPRK's successful test-launch of ICBM, the U.S. is letting out dangerous war rhetoric every day.
					 Trump's wild remarks have touched off great fury of south Koreans from all walks of life as soon after their disclosure.
					
					 Upset by the public mindset turning unfavorable for him, the south Korean chief executive solicited Trump for help over the phone, saying that "there should not be another disaster of war on the Korean peninsula" and "sanctions and pressure should be imposed but the nuclear issue of the north should be settled in a peaceful and diplomatic way".
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says that this only brings into bolder relief the brigandish true nature of the U.S. stooping to any infamy to realize its ambition for aggression, and the wretched position of the puppet forces as colonial stooges who can not but serve the U.S.
					
					 The present ruling quarters' act of submitting to the U.S. is an intolerable traitorous act which leaves the destiny of the south Koreans to the tender mercy of aggressors, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The tragic situation in south Korea is an inevitable product of the despicable act of treachery perpetrated by the present ruling quarters who maintain their power by clinging to the coattail of the U.S. and find their way out in tightening "alliance".
					
					 It is needless to say that the south Korean authorities' act of submitting to the U.S. while reading its face without any principle is encouraging the U.S. to practice high-handed and arbitrary practices and bringing greater disaster to south Korea.
					
					 The present situation in south Korea clearly proves that submission and dependence will lead to disgrace and ruin.
					
					 The shameful master-servant relationship of submission must be ended as soon as possible.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet FM Denounced as Confrontation Maniac: Minju Joson
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet FM Denounced as Confrontation Maniac: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, south Korean puppet Foreign Minister Kang Kyong Hwa at the ministerial meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum had talks with U.S., Japan and other countries and begged for cooperation in applying sanctions and pressure against the DPRK while asserting "the will to thoroughly implement the sanctions resolution against the north" and "cooperation in implementing it".
					 Minju Joson says in a commentary on Sunday that this is a ridiculous and petty begging unaware of the changed strategic position of the DPRK and the trend of the times, adding this vividly shows the real character of the confrontation maniac going in skirt.
					
					 The disgraceful behavior of Kang Kyong Hwa clearly proves that the present south Korean authorities are trying to stifle the DPRK at any cost with the backing of foreign forces and realize their wild dream of "unification by absorption" just like the conservative regime, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 As long as Kang Kyong Hwa, a woman confrontation maniac and a dolt crazy about sycophancy toward the U.S., holds the post of the puppet foreign minister, the south Korean people will suffer more disgrace and humiliation far surpassing that under the previous conservative regime.
					
					 Kang Kyong Hwa should control her tongue, understanding that the candlelight demonstrators who sent the conservative regime to destruction are on the lookout for an opportunity.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces Plan to Stage Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces Plan to Stage Joint Military Exercises
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces plan to stage Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises to invade the DPRK from August 21.
					 The U.S. Defence Department announced this on August 11.
					
					 By describing the aggressive nature of the drill as "annual" and "defensive", the U.S. imperialist warmongers are mulling kicking up war zeal once again.
					
					 Shortly ago, the U.S. chief executive bluffed that if there breaks out any war, it will be out on the Korean peninsula and if thousands die, the place will be the peninsula, thereby openly disclosing his intention to ignite a nuclear war. The projected joint military exercises in the wake of such remarks clearly prove where the exercises will end up.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian National Seminar on Juche Idea
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian National Seminar on Juche Idea
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in a Nigerian national seminar on the Juche idea under the title of "Guidance of HE Kim Jong Un, peerlessly great man, and self-development of the DPRK" on August 5.
					 The letter noted that the great leader HE Kim Il Sung, eternal president of the DPRK, founded the Juche idea that defines man as the master of his own destiny who has the power of carving it out and the great leader HE Kim Jong Il developed the Juche idea, the Songun idea in depth.
					
					 With this idea as their faith, the Korean people could build a power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence, a political and military power, in the spirit of self-reliance and the DPRK emerged a nuclear weapons state and an ICBM possessor in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development, it said.
					
					 Thanks to the wise guidance of HE Kim Jong Un, the strategic position of the DPRK could rise to the highest level, the letter said, adding:
					
					 The DPRK's spirit of self-development rooted in the Juche idea and miraculous achievements made by dint of this spirit are greatly encouraging the world progressives aspiring after independence and peace.
					
					 We, participants in the seminar, will further give wide publicity to Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the people-first doctrine and source of self-development.

articles.title: Gift and Medal to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Nigerian National Seminar
articles.content:
Gift and Medal to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Nigerian National Seminar
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift and medal by the participants in the Nigerian national seminar on the Juche idea.
					 The gift and medal were conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to Nigeria by Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, on August 5.

articles.title: National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Nigeria
articles.content:
National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Nigeria
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian national seminar on the Juche idea took place in Abuja on Aug. 5 under the title of "Guidance of HE Kim Jong Un, peerlessly great man and self-development of the DPRK".
					 Attending it were personages of various political parties, organizations and institutions and masses and the DPRK ambassador to Nigeria and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 A report and speeches were made there.
					
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, in his speech lauded the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the foundation and development of the DPRK.
					
					 He said that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un is demonstrating the might of socialist Korea of Juche before the world with his outstanding leadership ability.
					
					 Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, stressed that the Korean people will certainly accomplish the cause of building a power with their own efforts and technology under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Aba Sadik Abubakr, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, said that Kim Jong Il is the great saint as he ensured durable peace for mankind by leading to victory the standoff between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 Ahmed Blaza Lawan, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics, expressed support and solidarity to the Korean people's struggle for genuine international justice and national reunification.
					
					 Professors of the University of Abuja said the DPRK showed once again the truth that everyone has the might of defending oneself through the access to nukes and displayed the validity of independence, self-support and self-reliance based on the Juche idea, adding the Korean people's spirit of self-development is urgently needed for the development of Nigeria.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: DPRK's ICBM Test-fire Hailed in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's ICBM Test-fire Hailed in Different Countries
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Polish and Italian bodies released statements on July 30 hailing the DPRK's success in the second test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14.
					 The International Friendship Initiative "Explore DPRK" of Poland in its statement said that the DPRK manufactured ICBM Hwasong-14 with recourse to its own resources and technology.
					
					 It noted:
					
					 The muscle of the Korean People's Army has become stronger with the possession of SLBM, nukes and ICBM.
					
					 This shows that nothing can check Juche Korea's development of defence industry.
					
					 The U.S. should face up to the reality that its whole territory is within the range of DPRK's rockets.
					
					 The Italy-DPRK Association for Friendship and Solidarity and the Italian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association noted in a joint statement:
					
					 We warmly congratulate the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people on their success in the second test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14.
					
					 This great success of the Korean people who are upholding the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, rallied close around him is giving great strength and courage to all the progressive peoples in the world aspiring after independence, peace and socialism against imperialism.
					
					 This also dealt a telling blow to the arrogant U.S. imperialists.
